sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 22, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – These trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 18th and 19th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Plenty of lake effect , combined with low 20 degree temps, plus the full big groom this morning , makes Nubs Knob red and blue trails as nice as it gets !

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Excellent day out classic skiing on skins.  Tracks very good and fast most of the way around in the woods except for a few shallow spots but not down to the dirt.  Tracks blown in on connector with the wind.  Snow gun was running today also.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be packed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold start to the morning, but a Southerly wind should bring the temperature up to around 20 degrees by the afternoon. The snow is in great shape today. We received 3 inches of snow yesterday and all that new snow is now groomed into the base. Expect a slower snow with exceptional grip today. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 9 PM today with an hour break at 430 PM to prepare for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
